name: Quantum Data Systems (HK)
overview:
Quantum Data Systems (QDS) was established in 1982 in Hong Kong. Today we are one of Hong Kong’s leading Independent Distributor of branded IT and facility solutions including Avocent, AdaptivCool, Dartware, EDP, Ergotron, Gesab, Hetec, Humanscale, ICRON, iHSE, LANDesk, NTI, Primera, RF Code, Simplex, Server Technology, Triad, Upsite Technologies (KoldLok) and many more. At QDS, our total commitment to customer satisfaction is second to none. Our focus and strength in providing the latest proven IT and facility solutions in data center and other facilities, minimizes risk and maximizes value to our customers and partners. Also, our team at QDS excels at providing an industry leading pre- and post-sale support.

Now with operations in Hong Kong, Macau, and a number of major cities in China, our partner and customer networks span across the Asia Pacific region. Also our role as an Independent Distributor allows us to partner with all major System Integrators, Network Integrators, Project Managers, Facilities Managers and Resellers on any IT/Facility projects in the region

offices.address1: Unit 709, 7/F, Block B, Hoi Leun Industrial Center
